name: ninja
description: The feature packed, lightning fast boilerplate we use at Graffino for building modern responsive static and WordPress powered websites.

scripts.[Ninja] => Resonable Defaults: Reasonable defaults: dev, static, build for quick access.
scripts.webpack:dev:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running static development build... 
'; webpack serve --mode=development --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.webpack:build:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running static production build... 
'; webpack --mode=production --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.webpack:wp:dev:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running WordPress development build... 
'; webpack --mode=development --watch --config webpack.wordpress.js
scripts.webpack:wp:build:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running WordPress production build... 
'; webpack --mode=production --config webpack.wordpress.prod.js
scripts.[Ninja] => WordPress Management: WordPress management scripts for dev, build, setup, wp database scripts, file syncing, etc. Remote syncing *requires* rsync (brew install rsync).
scripts.wp:build: yarn node:install; yarn composer:install; yarn wp:clean --no-confirm; yarn wp:uploads:symlink --no-confirm; yarn webpack:wp:build --progress
scripts.wp:setup:
echo '
[Ninja] => Installing WordPress... 
'; yarn node:install; yarn composer:install; yarn wp:clean --no-confirm; yarn wp:db:init --no-confirm; yarn wp:uploads:symlink --no-confirm
scripts.wp:update:
echo '
[Ninja] => Updating WordPress... 
'; yarn composer:update; yarn wp:clean --no-confirm; yarn wp:uploads:symlink --no-confirm
scripts.[Ninja] => Utilities: Utilities for cleaning all temporary files, bumping version using semver.
scripts.composer:install:
echo '
[Ninja] => Installing composer modules... 
'; composer install --prefer-dist
scripts.composer:update:
echo '
[Ninja] => Updating composer modules... 
'; composer update --prefer-dist
scripts.composer:outdated:
echo '
[Ninja] => Outdated composer modules... 
'; composer show --latest
scripts.node:update:
echo '
[Ninja] => Update node modules... 
'; ncu -u; yarn node:install
scripts.[Ninja] Git Scripts: Several more comple git scripts used in deployment.
scripts.git:pull-merge-push:
echo '
[Ninja] => Commiting changes...
'; git add -A; git commit -m '[Ninja] Automatic deploy merge'; git pull -s recursive -X theirs --no-edit; echo '
[Ninja] => Pushing changes...
'; git push
scripts.git:pull-reset:
echo '
[Ninja] => Pulling changes...
'; git fetch --all; git clean -f; git reset --hard origin/$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.[Ninja] => Code QA: Linting and code standards prettifiers for JS and SCSS.
scripts.lint: yarn lint:js; yarn lint:scss; yarn lint:php
scripts.lint:js:
echo '
[Ninja] => Start linting JS...
'; eslint src -c .eslintrc --ext js
scripts.fix: yarn fix:js; yarn fix:scss; yarn fix:php

author: team@graffino.com
